name: Mool Mantar With Audio
description: The Mool Mantar is the first hymn in the Guru Granth Sahib, the holy scripture of the Sikhs. mool mantar listen everyday for Good Luck & Wealth & Happiness. Composed by Guru Nanak Dev ji. This app connect new generation with Sikhism. This app can download in electronic gadgets like phones and tablets.   ---FEATURES---  -> READING WITH AUDIO PLAY  -> LIFETIME FREE DOWNLOADING -> ATTRACTIVE INTERFACE -> LIGHT WEIGHT APP AND EASY TO DOWNLOAD
